arts.ttl: Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca left red-faced as Brighton brutally respond to childish snub
arts.sum: Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca failed to acknowledge Fabian Hurzeler as a top coach prior to their meeting with Brighton on Friday, but the Seagulls boss had the last laugh

arts.ttl: Chelsea injury news: Blues suffer fresh fitness blow to key man in "worst performance" of season
arts.sum: Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca says that Noni Madueke is facing a spell on the sidelines due to the hamstring issue that he suffered against Brighton & Hove Albion.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca gives mixed injury update on two Chelsea players straight after Brighton defeat
arts.sum: Chelsea slipped to a heavy defeat away to Brighton on Friday night, and there were some injury scares to go along with a really poor...

arts.ttl: Why Palmer shouted at Madueke for Chelsea vs Brighton as tempers flare
arts.sum: Stripped of his tormentor-in-chief for much of the past 18 months in Nicolas Jackson, nobody at Chelsea looks like doing anything, let alone scoring, other than Palmer. Palmer's two moments in a 3-0 humiliation at the hands of a club Chelsea have tried to copy and scale up under new owners were both the sort of chance he has converted without thinking for much of his short senior career to date.

arts.ttl: 1 goal in 10 games – Chelsea given opportunity to offload overrated star
arts.sum: Chelsea striker Nicolas Jackson is reportedly emerging as a transfer target for some big names like Atletico Madrid and Newcastle United ahead of this summer. The Senegal international has long been regarded as a player with a big future at Stamford Bridge, but one has to wonder if he’s running out of time to really […] The post 1 goal in 10 games – Chelsea given opportunity to offload overrated star appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Saturday's Transfer Talk Update: Deivid Washington, Kai Havertz, Ola Aina
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest confirmed transfer news and speculation from across the footballing world.

arts.ttl: I saw what Fabian Hurzeler said after Enzo Maresca snub and cheeky post from Brighton – it said everything
arts.sum: All the reaction from Brighton’s 3-0 Premier League victory against Chelsea

arts.ttl: Every word Enzo Maresca said on Chelsea loss, Cole Palmer body language, fan chants
arts.sum: I think in the moment that we are, 14 games to go before tonight's game, fourth in the league and winning you can go one point from third and the gap bigger between the rest. In this moment, the bad feeling is that we look that easily we can concede chances and we struggle to create chances.

arts.ttl: Chelsea given Enzo Maresca sack verdict amid 'unforgiveable' transfer decisions
arts.sum: However, with Maresca starting to come under pressure following a decent start to life as Chelsea boss, Neville instead says that Chelsea's failure to bring in a top quality goalkeeper and No.9 after their huge transfer spend over recent years means the manager must be afforded at least the summer transfer window to try and form his side into bona fide challengers for the Premier League. Gary Neville says that Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca should not be under any pressure of being sacked "in any way, shape or form" despite the Blues' poor recent run of form - and that instead the blame lies above him.

arts.ttl: Chelsea next five fixtures after Brighton loss amid Enzo Maresca sack pressure
arts.sum: Here, football.london takes a look at Chelsea's upcoming fixtures compared to their Premier League rivals. March 9 vs Leicester City (H) at 2pm - Premier League
